resources.string:
Hello! My name is Knut Valen. 

I like lists, so here is a list about me: 

I like Swift. 

I like Kotlin. 

I like frontend development. 

I like React and JavaScript. 

I like to ride my mountainbike. 

I like to ride my snowboard. 

I like food. 

I love coffee. 

I like tacos.
